title: Naoji Ito
text:
is a former Japanese <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player. He played for <a href="Japan%20national%20football%20team">Japan national team</a>.
Club career.
Ito was born in <a href="Mie%20Prefecture">Mie Prefecture</a> on July 1, 1959. After graduating from high school, he joined the <a href="Japan%20Soccer%20League">Japan Soccer League</a> Division 2 club <a href="Honda%20FC">Honda</a> in 1978. In 1980, the club won the championship and was promoted to Division 1. In 1985-86, the club won third place and he left the club at the end of the season. He joined <a href="Sagan%20Tosu">PJM Futures</a> in 1988. He retired in 1993.
National team career.
On June 19, 1981, Ito debuted for <a href="Japan%20national%20football%20team">Japan national team</a> against <a href="Malaysia%20national%20football%20team">Malaysia</a>.
